subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Zach Parise, the Devils’ 27-year-old captain, will become an unrestricted free agent July 1, and he and the team have said they want him to stay put.
snippet: Zach Parise, the Devils’ 27-year-old captain, will become an unrestricted free agent July 1, and he and the team have said they want him to stay put.
